name: ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
fullname: ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
info: Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daughter of Abi Bakr, the first caliph

name: Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar
fullname: Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb
info: Wife of the Prophet ﷺ and daughter of ʿUmar, the second caliph

name: Umm Salamah
fullname: Hind bint Abi Umayyah ibn al-Mughīrah
searchname: Umm Salamah Hind bint Abi Umayyah ibn al-Mughīrah
info: Wife of the Prophet Muḥammad ﷺ

name: Zaynab bint Jaḥsh
fullname: Umm al-Muʿminīn Zaynab bint Jaḥsh
info: Wife of the Prophet ﷺ who was divorced from Zayn ibn al-Ḥārithah

name: Ramlah bint Abi Sufyān
fullname: Umm al-Muʿminīn Umm Ḥabībah Ramlah bint Abi Sufyān
searchname: Umm Ḥabībah Ramlah bint Abi Sufyan
info: Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daught of Abi Sufyān

name: Fāṭimah bint Muḥamamd
fullname: Fāṭimah bint Muḥamamd
info: Daughter of the Prophet and step-daughter of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

name: Asmāʾ bint ʿUmays
fullname: Asmāʾ bint ʿUmays ibn Maʿd
info: Companion of the Prophet ﷺ and famous for having married 3 prominent male companions at 3 different times: Jaʿfar ibn Abi Ṭālib, then when he died, Abu Bakr as-Siddīq, and when he died, ʿAli ibn Abi Ṭālib.

name: Asmāʾ bint Abi Bakr
fullname: Asmāʾ bint Abi Bakr
info: Sister of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

name: Umm ʿAṭiyyah al-Anṣāriyyah
fullname: Nasībah bint al-Ḥārith Umm ʿAṭiyyah al-Anṣāriyyah
searchname: Nasibah bint al-Harith Umm Atiyyah al-Ansariyyah
info: A female companion who washed the body of Zaynab, the daughter of the Prophet ﷺ, when she died, and participated in several battles alongside the Prophet ﷺ.

name: Asmāʾ bint Yazīd
fullname: Asmāʾ bint Yazīd ibn al-Sakan
info: Companion of the Prophet ﷺ, an Anṣāri woman known as Khaṭībat al-Nisāʾ, or the Speaker of the Women, due to her outspokenness and eloquence. She also participated in battles with the Prophet ﷺon multiple occasions

name: Zaynab bint Abi Salamah
fullname: Zaynab bint Abi Salamah
info: Daughter of Umm Salamah, and step-daughter of the Prophet ﷺ

name: Umm Hishām bint Ḥārithah
fullname: Umm Hishām bint Ḥārithah bint al-Nuʿmān
searchname: Umm Hisham bint Harithah bint al-Numan
info: An Anṣārī companion of the Prophet ﷺ who took part in the Pledge of the Tree

name: Ḥabībah bint Sahl
fullname: Ḥabībah bint Sahl bint Thaʿlabah al-Anṣāriyyah
searchname: Habibah bint Sahl bint Thalabah al-Ansariyyah
info: An Anṣārī companion of the Prophet ﷺ

name: Umm Mubashshir al-Anṣāriyyah
fullname: Umm Mubashshir al-Anṣāriyyah
info: An Anṣārī companion of the Prophet ﷺ

name: Ṣafiyyah bint Shaybah
fullname: Ṣafiyyah bint Shaybah ibn ʿUthmān
info: A companion of the Prophet ﷺ who narrated from several of his wives

name: Umm ʿUthmān
fullname: Umm ʿUthman bint Sufyān or Umm Walad
info: Mother of Ṣafiyyah bint Shaybah

name: ʿAiʾshah bint Ṭalḥah
fullname: ʿAiʾshah bint Ṭalḥah ibn ʿUbaydillāh
info: Niece of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr

name: Ḥafṣah bint ʿAbdur-Raḥmān
fullname: Ḥafṣah bint ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn Abi Bakr
searchname: Hafsah bint Abdur-Rahman ibn Abi Bakr
arabicname: حفصة بنت عبد الرحمن بن أبي بكر
info: Granddaughter of Abu Bakr and therefore the niece of ʿĀʾishah

name: Fāṭimah bint al-Munthir ibn al-Zubayr
fullname: Fāṭimah bint al-Munthir ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām
searchname: Fatimah bint al-Munthir ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam
arabicname: فاطمة بنت المنذر بن الزبير بن العوام
info: Wife of Hishām ibn ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr and great-niece of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr

name: Khayrah Umm al-Hasan al-Baṣri
fullname: Khayrah Umm al-Hasan al-Baṣri
info: Servant of Umm Salamah and the mother of the famous scholar, Al-Hasan Al-Baṣri

name: Ḥafṣah bint Sīrīn
fullname: Umm al-Huthayl Ḥafṣah bint Sīrīn al-Anṣāriyyah
searchname: Umm al-Huthayl Hafsah bint Sirin al-Ansariyyah
info: 8th century jurist, scholar, ascetic, and sister of the famous scholar Muḥammad ibn Sīrīn
notes: maybe mention that quote from nadwi's book about someone who preferred her hadiths to her brother's

name: ʿAmrah bint ʿAbd ur-Raḥmān
fullname: ʿAmrah bint ʿAbd ur-Raḥmān ibn Saʿd ibn Zarārah
searchname: Amrah bint Abdur-Rahman ibn Sad ibn Zararah
arabicname: عمرة بنت عبد الرحمن بن سعد بن زرارة
info: A successor (one of the Tābiʿīn) who narrated from several female companions.

name: Umm ad-Dardāʾ aṣ-Ṣughrā
fullname: Umm ad-Dardāʾ aṣ-Ṣughrā
info: Wife of the companion Abu ad-Dardāʾ. She was a scholar, jurist, and teacher based in Damascus and Jerusalem.

name: Ṣafiyyah bint Abi ʿUbayd al-Thaqafi
fullname: Ṣafiyyah bint Abi ʿUbayd ibn Masʿūd al-Thaqafi
searchname: Safiyyah bint Abi Ubayd ibn Masud al-Thaqafi
arabicname: صفية بنت أبي عبيد بن مسعود الثقفية
info: Wife of Ābdullāh ibn ʿUmar

name: Umm ʿAwn
fullname: Umm ʿAwn bint Muḥammad ibn Jaʿfar ibn Abi Ṭālib
searchname: Umm Awn bint Muhammad ibn Jafar ibn Abi Talib
arabicname: أم عون بنت محمد بن جعفر بن أبي طالب
info: Granddaughter of Asmāʾ bint ʿUmays and Jaʿfar ibn Abi Ṭālib

name: Umm ʿĪsā
fullname: Umm ʿĪsā al-Jazzār or Umm Īsā al-Khuzāʿiyyah
searchname: Umm Isa al-Jazzar or Umm Isa al-Khuzaiyyah
info: A successor

name: Al-Rabāb bint Ṣulayʿ
fullname: Umm al-Rāʾiḥ Al-Rabāb bint Ṣulayʿ al-Ḍabiyyah
searchname: Umm al-Raih Al-Rabab bint Sulay al-Dabiyyah
info: Niece of Salmān ibn ʿĀmir
